Player History
Injured on 5/13/1978 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 6/4/1979 with a Bone Chips Shoulder, out for full season...
Had first career hit on 6/16/1982, off Nick Saez (Min)...
Earned first career win on 6/16/1982...
Injured on 4/24/1984 with a Torn Bicep Muscle, out for 6 weeks...
Won World Championship with Bay City in 1984...
Injured on 4/3/1986 with a Bone Chips Elbow, out for 5 weeks...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 10/1/1986, going 2-1, 0.73...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 5/1/1987, going 3-0, 0.86...
Injured on 6/2/1987 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Hit first career homerun on 8/6/1987, off Carl Peak (Mal)...
Traded from Bay City to Ashburn on 7/31/1989 (Going to BC: SS T. Boyle. Going to Ash: P V. Lopez, P G. Ledbetter)...
Signed as a free agent by New Jersey on 2/16/1991 to a 4-year deal worth $2,960,100 per year...
Was selected to the 1992 Allstar game...
